title: 服务器神秘6魔导手册崩客户端
txt_content:
在点开魔导手册上的东西时客户端会崩溃








crash-2018-05-04_11.49.45-client.txt


2018-5-4 13:51 上传
点击文件名下载附件




36.77 KB, 下载次数: 1

replies.txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  BedPatch (【床修复】bedpatch-2.2-1.12.2.jar)
  CTMCorePlugin (【连接材质】CTM-MC1.12-0.2.3.12.jar)
  AstralCore (【星辉魔法】astralsorcery-1.12.2-1.8.5.jar)
  CorePlugin (【平滑字体】SmoothFont-1.12.2-1.15.jar)
  Plugin (【ID扩展】NotEnoughIDs-1.5.4.2.jar)
  ShetiPhian-ASM (【前置】shetiphiancore-1.12.0-3.5.6.jar)
  CoreMod (【前置】Aroma1997Core-1.12.2-1.3.0.2.jar)
  LoadingPlugin (【夸克】Quark-r1.4-123.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (【R键整理】InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
  JechCore (【拼音搜索】JustEnoughCharacters-1.12.0-2.2.2.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! Remove FoamFixAPI (or replace with FoamFixAPI-Lawful) and try again. (【泡沫修复】FoamFix-1.12.2-0.9.4-Anarchy.jar)
  FMLPlugin (【前置】elulib-0.1.12.jar)
  IELoadingPlugin (ImmersiveEngineering-0.12-80-core.jar)
  ForgelinPlugin (【水利前置】Forgelin-1.6.0.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge
